website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and versatile wipes container in a slim design.
pros: Users appreciate the slim, sleek, and attractive design of this option
Customers note how portable it is and comment on its thin, durable design
We love that it's versatile enough to use for anything from baby wipes to makeup wipes
cons: Some reported leaking or failing to close correctly
a few felt it couldn't hold enough wipes

customer_reviews.title: May leak
customer_reviews.text: I really love the idea of these for my face wipes that I DIY. They would be a perfect solution as I was on vacation last week. When my bag went through TSA, the pouches were actually leaking. I can’t tell if it came from the construction of the pouch or how the lid attaches, but I was pretty bummed. The whole idea was that they would stay moist but not leak. (Keeping in mind these wipes weren’t soping.) I suppose it could’ve been that they were in the bag sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great pouch.
customer_reviews.text: I use wipes a lot as a makeup artist. This is such a convenient way to carry my wipes around and to keep looking professional. It’s sturdy not flimsy. It comes with extra red piece to securely release the wipes as needed.
customer_reviews.author: InnerBeautyOut

customer_reviews.title: Found it
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, the sleekness of the product. I keep one for diaper cluch and the other one in the car. The wipes has stayed moist. I wanted a product that I could grab the wipe with one hand, open, close and found it.
customer_reviews.author: 2buyfromme2u

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: They don’t have much give and you can’t put that many wipes in at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Tanlee

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I use them for myself
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I use them for myself, I don’t have any children. I am a person who works outside everyday and it’s very easy to carry the pouch in my pocket. I used to just use the wipe case it comes in but the sticker will get caught to the material and my wipes dry out. The bundle wet wipes pouch is perfect cause of the hard cover cap that keeps my wipes fresh and wet no matter how long I had my wipes sitting inside. Overall great item and great item!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shortly after my daughter was born a year and a half ago and am still using these! The wipes stay wet! It’s so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth and Chris’ baby shower registery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and secure closure
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and it looks so flat but I was able to fit 25 to 30 wipes. The color is vibrant and it fits in my sugar snap organizer perfectly. Like that it comes with additional snap closures Incase first one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: It's rather cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had intended to use this product with the cottonelle brand wipes. I like the dispensing method as opposed to similar other products. The material these pouches are made of is very thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: lifelong user

customer_reviews.title: Cute... Unless your baby actually poops.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and doesn't hold many wipes. If your baby poops more than once, you're going to need more wipes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Super durable. Easy to refill and seals well
customer_reviews.text: Super durable. Easy to refill and seals well. Keeps the wipes moist a long time. I keep one in our ATV & one in my daily use diaper bag and they have endured the elements very well!
customer_reviews.author: Landman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The new snap on lid seems to have created a tight seal!
customer_reviews.author: Greenie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for your diaper bag! I love that they don’t weigh down my bag like most other wipe containers. The designs are super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Landers

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, makes the wipes difficult to come out. Don't be in a rush, then they'll tear and you're stuck with half a wipe. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying, only 10 pieces of wipes fit here at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Remy Villapana

product_meta.title: Be Bundles Wet Wipes Pouch VERSION 2 - NEW replacement snap-on lid included, 2-Pack, Black Geometric/Navy Chevron - VINYL FREE (EVA and PVC)!!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
